articles.description: Follow live text and audio commentary from the Mexican Grand Prix.
articles.title: Mexican Grand Prix build-up: Leclerc on pole

articles.description: Erling Haaland scores twice and Phil Foden once as Manchester City beat Manchester United comfortably in the derby at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Haaland and Foden score as Man City beat Man Utd

articles.description: Liverpool's players show their support to absent team-mate Luis Diaz during a comfortable win over Nottingham Forest at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool show support for absent Diaz in Forest win

articles.description: England's miserable World Cup campaign slumps further as they collapsed to a 100-run defeat by hosts India in Lucknow.
articles.title: England beaten by India in latest capitulation

articles.description: Watch highlights as England slump to another defeat, losing to India by 100 runs, as the hosts continued their unbeaten start to the Cricket World Cup in Lucknow.
articles.title: Abject England slump to heavy defeat by India

articles.description: Dominic Calvert-Lewin's piece of brilliance ensures Everton secure victory in their first game since the death of chairman Bill Kenwright.
articles.title: Calvert-Lewin clinches Everton win on poignant day

articles.description: Nottingham Panthers' Adam Johnson dies after suffering a cut to his neck from a skate in a Challenge Cup match against the Sheffield Steelers.
articles.title: Ice hockey player Johnson dies after neck cut

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary of Cleveland Browns at Seattle Seahawks in the NFL.
articles.title: Listen: NFL - Cleveland Browns at Seattle Seahawks

articles.description: Rangers score twice in the dying minutes to defeat brave Hearts 2-1 and reduce Celtic's Scottish Premiership lead to five points.
articles.title: Rangers strike late to break Hearts & narrow gap

articles.description: Harry Kane scores an incredible goal from his own half on his way to a hat-trick as Bayern Munich thrash Darmstadt 8-0 in a game featuring three first-half red cards.
articles.title: Hat-trick hero Kane scores from own half in 8-0 win
